titles.title: A resolution recognizing "Inventing Flight: The Centennial Celebration", a celebration in Dayton, Ohio of the centennial of Wilbur and Orville Wright's first flight.
A resolution recognizing "Inventing Flight: The Centennial Celebration", a celebration in Dayton, Ohio of the centennial of Wilbur and Orville Wright's first flight.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Hatch without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 135.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced on May 12, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Recognizes "Inventing Flight: The Centennial Celebration," a celebration in Dayton, Ohio, of the centennial of Wilbur and Orville Wright's first flight.
